value.title: Nutanix Launches Cloud Clusters (NC2) on Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Nutanix has announced the general availability of Nutanix Cloud Clusters (NC2) on Microsoft Azure, extending its hybrid cloud environment to Microsoft Azure dedicated bare metal nodes.
